name: Ahern and Associates Ltd.
tag_list: trucking, trucking-company-business, logistics, company-mergers, ahern-and-associates, andy-ahern
overview:
Ahern and Associates is North America’s leading trucking and transportation management consulting firm. The skilled consultants at Ahern and Associates specialize in mergers and acquisitions of trucking companies and logistics companies as well as the restructuring and evaluation of existing carriers that seek to increase operating efficiency and improve profitability. Since 1987, Ahern and Associates has aided hundreds of buyers in the acquisition of trucking and logistics companies throughout the U.S. and Canada as well as assisting many transportation and logistics companies in reducing their overall operating costs and increasing their profitability.

As the industry’s most progressive and professional transportation and trucking company consulting firm in North America, they specialize in:

* Trucking company Mergers
* Trucking company Divestitures
* Trucking company Acquisitions
* Transportation company Mergers
* Transportation company Acquisitions
* Logistics company Mergers
* Logistics company acquisitions
* Operational Reviews
* Transportation/Logistics Turnaround
* Sales and Marketing Programs
* Transportation Successor Planning
* Trucking Company Employee Evaluation
* Transportation Software

Ahern & Associates can help your trucking or logistics company:

* Increase Operating Efficiency
* Reduce Operating Cost
* Improve Bottom Line Profitability
